title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3906/92 of 19 December 1992 establishing, for 1993, certain measures for the conservation and management of fishery resources, applicable to vessels flying the flag of a Member State, other than Spain and Portugal, in waters falling under the sovereignty or within the jurisdiction of the Kingdom of Spain
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N°  3906/92 of 19 December 1992 establishing, for 1993, certain measures for the conservation and  management of fishery resources, applicable to vessels flying the flag of a Member State, other  than Spain and Portugal, in waters falling under the sovereignty or within the jurisdiction of the  Kingdom of Spain
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The number of vessels flying the flag of a Member State of the  Community, other than Spain and Portugal, authorized to fish in waters falling under the  sovereignty or within the jurisdiction of the Kingdom of Spain as provided for in Article 164 of  the Act of Accession and the procedures governing access, shall be as set out in the Annex to this  Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force in 1 January 1993.
It shall be applicable until 31 December 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1992.
For the Council The President J. GUMMER
(1) OJ N° L 207, 29. 7. 1987, p. 1. Regulation as amended by Regulation (EEC)  N° 3483/88 (OJ N° L 306, 11. 11. 1988, p. 2).
ANNEX
EEC - SPAIN
